document.full_text: federal safety regulators say a popular hair smoothing treatment called brazilian blowout can release unsafe levels of formaldehyde, posing a risk to salon workers and customers.
document.title: washington: u.s. warns against brazilian blowout
lines_and_colors: federal safety regulators say a popular hair smoothing treatment called brazilian blowout can release unsafe levels of formaldehyde, posing a risk to salon workers and customers.
